The Alien Evasion begins when you press Start Running.

 You can also press Start Running to continue to play an Evasion that's already in progress.

 You can view your previous Evasions by pressing Evasions on the main screen.

 Press Achievements to track your progress and see what cool new aliens you've unlocked.

 When aliens invade....evade!

Alien Evasion

 You are out for a casual walk in the park when suddenly you see a UFO land! Aliens begin to pour out and they don’t look very friendly. They take notice of you and what do you do..... RUN!!!!!

 Alien Evasion is a game where you run in real life while aliens close in on you. Unlock lots of achievements and receive constant feedback about your run.

 Alien Evasion lets you track your movement on the map using your phone’s GPS. Scroll, zoom in and zoom out on the map to see your location. View your past runs in the Evasions list.

 During Evasions the app encourages you to keep running by checking your speed and telling you that you are doing really well or warning you that you should pick up the pace. Hurry up! You don’t want the aliens to catch you.

 Don’t feel like running? We’re right there with you. You can play Alien Evasion while you walk, but walk too slowly and you won’t get away!
